text: Dave Lee Travis (born 25 May 1945), also known as DLT, is a British radio and television presenter. He was born in Buxton, Derbyshire. He started being a presenter for BBC Radio 1 in 1967. From 1981 to 2001, Travis presented A Jolly Good Show. ==Personal life== Travis married his wife Marianne in 1971. He said he has cheated on her "once or twice".DLT 'sex assaults claims insane' ==Sex offence charges== Travis was arrested on 15 November 2012 as part of Operation Yewtree, an investigation into sexual abuse by Jimmy Savile and other people.DLT held by police Travis was on trial for 14 counts of indecent assault and one count of sexual assault. He pleaded not guilty to all charges.DLT denies assaults Travis told police that if he had known Savile was a paedophile he would have reported him. Travis was cleared of all but two charges on 13 February 2014. He was retried on those two charges and another charge. On 23 September 2014, he was convicted of one count of indecent assault. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:British radio personalities Category:British sex offenders Category:English television presenters Category:Operation Yewtree Category:People acquitted of sex crimes Category:People from Derbyshire
